WHEREAS the President is satisfied that the person named in (he
schedule to this order is entitled to hold the office specified therein
as required by subsection (2) of section Three of the Chiefs Act:
Now lHEREFORE, in exercise of the powers contained in section
three of the Chief Act, the following Order is hereby made:
I.T his Order may be cited as the Chiefs (Recognition)(No.2) Title
Order, 2009.
· 2. The person named in the Schedule to this Order is hereby Recognition
recognised as being within the area in Zambia described in the oCfh ief
Schedule, the holder of the office specified in the Schedule.
